title: Manchester United starlet Mason Greenwood signs new contract
text:
Mason Greenwood has been rewarded for his progress at Manchester United with a new contract until June 2023.

The deal, which includes the option for a further 12 months, was confirmed on Friday.

Greenwood became the youngest player in United’s history to start a Premier League game when he made his full debut against Cardiff in May, and the 18-year-old has continued to impress since then.

Manchester United youngster Mason Greenwood has committed his future to the club

Greenwood became the youngest player in United’s history to start a Premier League game

He scored against Leeds and Inter Milan on tour this summer to cement a place in Ole Gunnar Solskjaer’s first-team plans, and has been on target against Astana and Rochdale this season.

The England Under-21 international, who has been at United since the age of seven, said: ‘Having grown up as a Manchester United fan, playing for the first team is a real dream come true.

Greenwood was on target in the cup clash against Rochdale (pictured) and Astana in Europe

‘I know that, when I play for this club, I represent the whole academy and I want to repay the faith that my coaches have shown in me with my performances on the pitch.

‘I am learning all the time from the manager and his coaching staff and I know that this is the perfect club to help me reach my potential.’

Solskjaer paid tribute to the teenager who has helped filled the gap left by Romelu Lukaku and Alexis Sanchez, as well as injuries to Anthony Martial and Jesse Lingard.

‘Mason has progressed through our outstanding academy and we are delighted with the progress he has made,’ said Solskjaer.

Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has previously said he believes Greenwood is the best finisher at United

‘At such a young age, he already has great pace and intelligence and he is such a natural finisher. Since he came into the first team, he has really impressed everyone with his drive and attitude, he has all the attributes to become a top player.

‘Mason is learning every day in training and, with his work ethic, there is no doubt that he has an excellent future ahead of him.’
description: Manchester United youngster Mason Greenwood has signed a new deal at Old Trafford, which will keep him at the club until at least 2023.
